definition: epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: He expounded his epistemology and methodology through exploring things to acquire knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 他以“格物致知”阐述其认识论和方法论。

sentences.english: In October, I will teach a class on Epistemology.
sentences.chinese: 十月份我将教一个班级的认识论课程。

sentences.english: In a word, naturalized epistemology remains normative.
sentences.chinese: 总之，自然化认识论仍然是规范的。

sentences.english: Physicists often accuse epistemologists of not paying sufficient attention to this fact.
sentences.chinese: 物理学家往往责备研究认识论者没有给予足够的注意。

sentences.english: Epistemology is also the foundation and the arcanum of Wang's theory as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 认识论部分是整个王阳明哲学的基础和奥秘所在。

sentences.english: The naissance course of historical materialism in the foundation course of historical epistemology.
sentences.chinese: 唯物史观的诞生过程表现为历史认识论的确立过程。

sentences.english: This new paradigm requires fascinating cultural and epistemological changes in science.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的范式需要科学上的文化与认识论的巨大变革。

sentences.english: So a very very quick summary of his epistemological approach.
sentences.chinese: 那便是他对认识论的简要概括。

sentences.english: In chapter two, I make a summary of FengQi's theory of freedom with broad sence epistemology in the background.
sentences.chinese: 第二章对广义认识论背景下的自由理论作了总的概述。

sentences.english: Among them, thoughts of praxis-meta-ontology and epistemology are especially remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 其中实践一元本体论思想和认识论思想显得尤为突出。

sentences.english: This view, however, furnishes no solution for the epistemological problem.
sentences.chinese: 这种观点，但是，提供了没有解决认识论的问题。

sentences.english: The new dialectical epistemology has replaced the dogmatism of traditional philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 以辩证的认识论的新方法取消了传统哲学的独断论。

sentences.english: The debates have incisive epistemological causes.
sentences.chinese: 新科玄之争存在深刻的认识论根源。

sentences.english: The development of intracerebral transplantation abides by the laws of epistemology and dialectics.
sentences.chinese: 它的产生和发展遵循着认识论和辩证法的客观规律。

sentences.english: If we draw there's this clear distinction between epistemology and metaphysics.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们将它清晰地定位于认识论和形而上学之间。

sentences.english: The core of Peirce's epistemology is anti-foundationism and fallibilism.
sentences.chinese: 皮尔士认识论的核心是反基础主义和可误论。

definition: the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality

pinyin: bian4 zheng4 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: dialectics/dialectic or Socratic method of debate
dualism, belief that the universe is made of two different substance (e.g. mind and matter or good and evil)

pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: theory of reflection (in dialectic materialism), i.e. every perception reflects physical reality
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
